body:
That would be difficult. We have release notes in-place but not linked
in for developers/testers to record known issues. If another large
documentation update comes through, you won't be able to separate out
the changes.


On 11/21/2017 04:38 PM, Brian Bockelman wrote:
>
> Indeed - any reason why we can't get release notes into the ITB branch
> as part of the release preparation process?
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/opensciencegrid/docs/pull/260#issuecomment-346184470>,
> or mute the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AHCS4HwIv_aBrX-hGBV3BxFTq-fpGy3fks5s41DSgaJpZM4QmbzA>.
>

-- 
Tim Theisen
Release Manager
HTCondor & Open Science Grid
Center for High Throughput Computing
Department of Computer Sciences
University of Wisconsin - Madison
4261 Computer Sciences and Statistics
1210 W Dayton St
Madison, WI 53706-1685
